name: Globed Central Server
author: pterodactyl@arcticwoof.xyz
description: Globed is an open-source, highly customizable multiplayer mod for Geometry Dash powered by Geode. (Central Server)

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

echo "its globbing time!"

# Get the machine architecture
arch=$(uname -m)

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Check the architecture and download the correct binary
if [[ "$arch" == "x86_64" || "$arch" == "i686" ]]; then
    echo "getting the $arch v${VERSION} of the globbing"
    curl -Lo ./globed-central-server-x64 https://github.com/GlobedGD/globed2/releases/download/v${VERSION}/globed-central-server-x64
    chmod +x ./globed-central-server-x64
    echo "globbing done. have a soggy day"

elif [[ "$arch" == "arm64" || "$arch" == "aarch64" ]]; then
    echo "getting the $arch v${VERSION} of the globbing"
    curl -Lo ./globed-central-server-arm64 https://github.com/GlobedGD/globed2/releases/download/v${VERSION}/globed-central-server-arm64
    chmod +x ./globed-central-server-arm64
    echo "globbing done. have a soggy day"
    echo "be sure to change your 'Globed File' from x64 to arm64 at the startup tab."

else
    echo "wth is $arch? lmao. this isnt a correct architecture so no globbing for you"
    echo "globbing failed."
fi
